states.interpretation: Buyers are aggressive and new positions are being added. Conviction move.
states.play: Trade with trend. Buy pullbacks; best entries near VWAP or prior value.
states.risk_note: Avoid fading while OI keeps expanding.

states.interpretation: Aggressive buyers are active, but net positioning is not increasing. Likely rotation/chop.
states.play: Scalp only. Don’t chase. Prefer fades at extremes; target VWAP.
states.risk_note: Breakouts often fail without OI expansion.

states.interpretation: Price is rising largely from shorts closing (position reduction) rather than fresh longs.
states.play: Take profits into strength. Wait for reversion/structure before re-entering.
states.risk_note: Move can end abruptly once liquidations finish.

states.interpretation: Price rises without strong aggressive buying. New positions added but CVD not confirming suggests passive demand/absorption.
states.play: Be cautious chasing. Prefer pullback entries after a break-and-hold above prior high or VWAP reclaim.
states.risk_note: If passive buyer pulls, price can snap back quickly.

states.interpretation: Price grinds up with little aggression and no new risk. Often mean-reverts once liquidity appears.
states.play: Light scalps only. Take profit quickly into prior highs/value high; avoid breakout chasing.
states.risk_note: Fragile move; reversals can be sharp.

states.interpretation: Price rises while positions close and CVD is neutral. Likely de-risking/covering rather than fresh trend.
states.play: Don’t chase. Look for exhaustion near +σ/prior resistance; fade only after failure and VWAP loss.
states.risk_note: Once covering ends, continuation probability drops.

states.market_state: Bull trap risk / distribution into strength
states.interpretation: Price rises while aggressive flow sells and positions build. Often indicates passive selling absorbing buys.
states.play: Avoid longs. Look for short setup at value high/prior resistance after a failed push and delta fails to recover.
states.risk_note: If price breaks and holds with volume and CVD flips up, invalidate the short idea.

states.interpretation: Aggressive selling appears even as price drifts up, with no new positioning. Often a stall then revert to mean.
states.play: Range logic. Fade highs into resistance; target VWAP/mid; require failure (lower high or reclaim failure).
states.risk_note: Don’t overstay shorts if price keeps stair-stepping higher.

states.interpretation: Positions are reducing while aggressive flow is sell-leaning; the up-move can be mechanical/illiquid.
states.play: Quick scalps only. Prefer fades near resistance if structure rolls over; otherwise stay flat.
states.risk_note: Thin conditions can whip; keep stops tight and size small.

states.market_state: Absorption at resistance / buy pressure trapped risk
states.interpretation: Aggressive buying and position build without price progress suggests strong passive supply absorbing.
states.play: Wait for break-and-hold above range high before long. If repeated failures, fade back to VWAP/value mid.
states.risk_note: If it breaks cleanly with OI still rising, it can trend fast—don’t stubbornly fade.

states.interpretation: Buyers are active but no net new risk and price is stuck. Typical two-way trade with slight bid.
states.play: Range scalp. Buy range low/near VWAP; take profit quickly near range high/value high.
states.risk_note: Signals are noisy in balance—avoid big size and avoid chasing.

states.interpretation: Buy flow + position reduction with no price lift suggests shorts covering into strong passive sell interest.
states.play: Expect chop. Favor mean reversion trades; fade failed breakouts from range high back toward VWAP.
states.risk_note: A real breakout needs fresh OI expansion—don’t assume continuation here.

states.interpretation: Positions are building while price and flow are neutral. Pressure is building for a directional move.
states.play: Wait for break-and-hold of range edge with volume. Trade the breakout; avoid guessing inside the range.
states.risk_note: Fakeouts are common—use tight invalidation back inside the range.

states.interpretation: No commitment and no build-up. Liquidity providers dominate; direction signals have low edge.
states.play: Mean reversion only. Fade extremes to VWAP/mid with small targets and tight stops.
states.risk_note: Directional trades are low probability—avoid forcing trades.

states.interpretation: Positions are being reduced with no directional pressure. Often precedes quieter range or a reset.
states.play: Scalp only or wait. Look for fresh participation (OI/volume) before taking directional trades.
states.risk_note: Low participation increases randomness—keep size small.

states.market_state: Absorption at support / sell pressure trapped risk
states.interpretation: Aggressive selling and position build without downside progress suggests passive bids absorbing.
states.play: Avoid shorting lows. Either wait for breakdown and hold below range low, or trade bounce to VWAP after sellers exhaust.
states.risk_note: If support breaks with OI rising, downside can accelerate—don’t average down.

states.interpretation: Sellers are active but no net new risk and price is stuck. Two-way trade with slight offer.
states.play: Range scalp. Sell range high/near value high; target VWAP/mid quickly.
states.risk_note: Don’t press size in balance; failed breakdowns snap back.

states.interpretation: Sell flow with position reduction and no price drop suggests long exits are being absorbed at support.
states.play: Watch for reversal if selling dries up; consider long only after reclaim of VWAP/range mid.
states.risk_note: If selling returns with OI up, it can flip into a bearish breakdown.

states.market_state: Bear trap risk / accumulation under pressure
states.interpretation: Price drops while aggressive buying and position build occur. Suggests absorption by stronger hands.
states.play: Avoid shorts. Wait for reclaim of prior level/VWAP then long toward value; require higher low + CVD stabilization.
states.risk_note: If support breaks and holds lower, cut quickly—absorption can fail.

states.interpretation: Buying appears into the drop but no net new positions. Often chop before another leg or mean reversion.
states.play: Scalp only. Prefer long only after reclaim and hold above a key level; otherwise stay defensive.
states.risk_note: Can keep grinding down without clear capitulation—don’t catch knives.

states.market_state: Short covering into downside / mixed unwind
states.interpretation: Positions are closing while buy flow appears, but price is still down. Often near local lows but not confirmed.
states.play: Reduce shorts. Look for reversal trigger (higher low + VWAP reclaim) before attempting long mean reversion.
states.risk_note: Don’t assume the bottom without structure; downside can continue.

states.interpretation: Price drops while positions build but CVD is neutral. Suggests passive sellers leaning on bids.
states.play: Favor shorts on pullbacks to VWAP/prior supply; require breakdown continuation or failure to reclaim.
states.risk_note: If price reclaims and holds above VWAP with CVD improving, abort shorts.

states.interpretation: Price grinds down without strong aggression and without new risk. Often mean-reverts after liquidity sweep.
states.play: Light scalps only. Take profit quickly near support; avoid pressing shorts late.
states.risk_note: Fragile move; sudden reversals are common.

states.interpretation: Position reduction while price falls suggests longs exiting without a strong aggressive sell wave.
states.play: Be careful shorting late. Look for exhaustion and potential bounce to VWAP after stabilization.
states.risk_note: When exits finish, downside can pause abruptly.

states.interpretation: Sellers are aggressive and new positions are being added. Conviction move with participation.
states.play: Trade with trend. Sell pullbacks; best entries near VWAP or prior value breakdown retest.
states.risk_note: Avoid bottom-fishing while OI keeps expanding.

states.interpretation: Aggressive selling is present but net positioning isn’t increasing. Often rotation/chop with mean reversion risk.
states.play: Scalp only. Don’t chase lows. Prefer selling failed bounces into VWAP; target quick moves.
states.risk_note: Continuation is less reliable without OI expansion.

states.interpretation: Forced long exits are driving the drop as positions close. Often near exhaustion but can overshoot.
states.play: Do not short late. Wait for exhaustion and reversal trigger; mean-revert toward VWAP if structure flips.
states.risk_note: Bounces can be violent—reduce leverage and use hard stops.
